title: The Sunshine ☀️ Blogger Award 🏅
content:
Hi Everyone, I'm happy and excited to receive The Sunshine Blogger award first I heart fully thank to Megala and I have been nominated for The Sunshine Blogger Award by my friendly blogger Megala is a person who loves to cook, inspiration to others and motivates a lot. Her cooking and the way she present recipes are beautiful it's best to visit and explore more about her blog and recipes too https://megalaskitchen.com/ My Answers To Her Questions: 1. How blogging changed your life? Blogging is not a word it's mini world in internet. I learned many things from scratch, those are making Blog, interacting with people, friends, more surfing and love to present more recipes to the blogging world 😊 2. How would you describe yourself in 3 words? I ❤️ Myself 3.What are you most proud of? I'm proud to be a woman 👩 4. Best thing ever happened to you There are many best things ever happened to me One of them, this year we went to sky deck, Chicago it's one of the tallest tower in world I really scared when we were on top it's skyscraper (103rd floor) but after few mins I become normal, took pictures and loved it next Disney Land, LA. Wow! what a place we enjoyed a lot and had fun! 5. What is your idea of freedom? For each and every human being has a right to do but in case of freedom it must have certain limitations. 6. What are your passions in life? My passions are cooking, painting, photography, Frosting, Travelling and discover new places Nominees are:
